Package multimonster.common.plugin

Interface Summary
Pluggable In normal cases the managing class of an component, like resourcemanager or transporter, implements the Pluggable interface, so the component is enabled to be extended with plugins
 

Class Summary
PlugIn Each specific PlugIn in the system has to extend this abstract class.
PlugInFactory The abstract PlugInFactory is the base for the component-specific factories.
PlugInIdentifier A PlugInIdentifier is an explicit identifier for a PlugInSubClass
PlugInInformation The PlugInInformation class contains the information needed by the component.
